data.description: By using this setting, the outermost part of the top/bottom pattern will be replaced by a number of concentric lines. Using one or two lines can improve roofs that start on infill material and ensure that they come out sturdier and with a smoother surface.
data.img_description: This image shows the extra skin wall count printed in a star shape on top of infill.
data.hints: - This setting also prevents zig zag patterns at narrow overhangs, preventing vibrations of the printhead.
